评论概述: Cool, breathable, runs large and holds odors
评论详情: I love the fact that this top is much more breathable than the other UV tops that I own. The neck area is a little large and it fits looser than other tops. All things that I am ok with. What I am not ok with is the fact that it traps odor. I am not saying that I am fresh after a workout by any means BUT I don't have this issue with any of the other UV tops I own AND they are much more form fitting. It takes multiple washes to get the smell out of the fabric. Other than that, the top is a good buy.

评论概述: Nice weight, very comfortable with a slight figure shape effect, so not boxy and manish.
评论详情: I have three colors in size L which have held up for over a year now of washing every week.  The blue, rust, and green colors are very attractive.  I am a size 12 and the L is a good fit for me.  If I move down to 145 vs 155 pounds, I will order the medium size.  Good price for a good product.  Highly recommend.

The Women's 1/4 Zip Pullover is an absolute wardrobe essential. Its versatility and comfort make it a go-to choice for a wide range of occasions. The quarter-zip design provides both style and practicality, allowing for easy temperature control and a touch of flair. The fit of this pullover is just right – not too tight, not too loose – offering a flattering silhouette without sacrificing comfort. The fabric is soft and cozy, making it perfect for casual outings, outdoor activities, or even lounging at home. The pullover's quality is evident, as it maintains its shape and color even after numerous washes. The range of colors available adds a pop of vibrancy to any outfit. One minor drawback is that it may not be the warmest option for extremely cold weather, but it works well as a layering piece. The Women's 1/4 Zip Pullover is a classic addition to any wardrobe. Its comfort, style, and durability make it a reliable choice for everyday wear. Whether you're dressing up or down, it's a versatile piece that never goes out of fashion.

评论概述: Light weight sun and wind protection.

评论概述: Nice alternative to usual SPF 50 shirts
评论详情: Fits well and is very soft against the skin. We live in SoCal and I have to watch my sun exposure after a lifetime of being out in the sun. I prefer this shirt to the usual polyester sunproof shirts which are made of woven rather than knit fabric. This is more like a rash guard, but fits better. It may be too warm for summer wear, but time will tell.
